issue.message: Composable functions should either emit content into the composition or return a value, but not both. If a composable should offer additional control surfaces to its caller, those control surfaces or callbacks should be provided as parameters to the composable function by the caller. See https://slackhq.github.io/compose-lints/rules/#do-not-emit-content-and-return-a-result for more information.

Composable functions should either emit content into the composition or return a value, but not both. If a composable should offer additional control surfaces to its caller, those control surfaces or callbacks should be provided as parameters to the composable function by the caller. See https://slackhq.github.io/compose-lints/rules/#do-not-emit-content-and-return-a-result for more information.

Composable functions should only be emitting content into the composition from one source at their top level. See https://slackhq.github.io/compose-lints/rules/#do-not-emit-multiple-pieces-of-content for more information.

Composable functions should only be emitting content into the composition from one source at their top level. See https://slackhq.github.io/compose-lints/rules/#do-not-emit-multiple-pieces-of-content for more information.
